api.ui.skin.base

Interface CustomUIBackground

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CustomUIFocusedAndHover<T>, CustomUIHoverAndPressed<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomButtonUI, CustomLabelUI, CustomMenuBarUI, CustomMenuItemUI, CustomMenuUI, CustomPanelUI, CustomTextAreaUI, CustomTextFieldUI, EnigmaButtonUI, EnigmaLabelUI, EnigmaMenuBarUI, EnigmaMenuItemUI, EnigmaMenuUI, EnigmaPanelUI, EnigmaTextAreaUI, EnigmaTextFieldUI

    public interface CustomUIBackground
    Méthodes pour les composants de l'UI voulant un fond.
    Since:
    4.0 27/12/2019
    Version:
    4.0 27/12/2019
    Author:
    Jorys-Micke ALAÏS, Louka DOZ, Loic SENECAT, Quentin RAMSAMY-AGEORGES

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Retourne l'image de fond du composant
